data.text: @CroydonLabour This is precisely why you need kicking out at the next election. The fact you say this with pride just shows how economically illiterate you are.
@Stuart_King @MarketingproBen @JHillamKenley @CroydonLabour @HamidaAli76 The more you mention money the more you lose
@MarketingproBen @josephleeesq @CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 I’d like apologies from all sides please Ben, Labour & Tory are both shite…..Green Party all the way

@CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 Complete and utter rubbish I have read in my entire life. Bankrupt council with millions miss used blaming the Tories. Voters are more educated these days. You have Tories to vote 4 your budget. Carry on spending.

@JHillamKenley @MarketingproBen @CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 @CroydonTories care to open up Fishers Folly and Davies House saga? #corrupt #Croydon @sassy_sae @CllrTimPollard @ArfurTowcrate and your billion spree as to where it went? And Illegal sale of Reisco Pottery? @michaelneal15 @CllrLynneHale @MarioCreatura @PollardHelen @GatlandMaria

@multigums @CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 Reckon my dog could "balance the budget" and increase the reserves if someone gave her a £120m bail-out. It is utter imbecility to holding this up as some kind of achievement
@InsideCroydon @CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 Not sure I'd be putting economic credibility as my USP if I were Labour candidate. Excruciating

@Stuart_King @MarketingproBen @JHillamKenley @CroydonLabour @HamidaAli76 What about Labour’s record. The council issued a press release in January 2020 ‘promising’ not to sell Heath Lodge in Grangewood Park quoting a councillor hailing how Labour had listened to the people. It’s being sold next Wednesday to pay off the interest on the bankruptcy debt
@CroydonLabour @Stuart_King @HamidaAli76 #LTN #parsonsmead @CroydonNbrhoods You were also ruined the peoples life in the borough 😡. https://t.co/pSoJPKdokn
